content: सादः [सद्-घञ्] {@--1@} Sinking, settling down. {@--2@} Exhaustion, weariness; उदितोरुसादमोतवेपथुमत् <ls>Śi. 9. 77.</ls> {@--3@} Leanness, thinness, emaciation; शरीरसादादसमग्रभूषणा <ls>R. 3. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Perishing, decay, loss, destruction, cessation; गतिविभ्रमसादनीरवा <ls>R. 8. 58</ls>; <ls>Nalod. 3. 24.</ls> {@--5@} Pain, torment. {@--6@} Clearness, purity. {@--7@} Going, motion.
